definition: International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC)
pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Zhong1 liu2 Yan2 jiu1 Ji1 gou4

sentences.english: The fibrous tissues aroud the tumor cells were positive for VG.
sentences.chinese: VG染色示腫瘤細胞周圍有纖維組織反應增生。

sentences.english: The left slice shows an area active during extemporaneous speech just posterior and adjacent to the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 左切片顯示面積活躍在即席講話只是後，毗鄰的腫瘤。

sentences.english: Ginger has powerful anti-inflammatory properties and can slow cancer growth. Turmeric, the spice that forms the base of most curries, is from a root in the ginger family.
sentences.chinese: 姜具有強大的抗炎功能，能減緩腫瘤的生長。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the expression of MMP9 in tumor tissues was positively associated with the MVD val-ue.
sentences.chinese: 腫瘤組織中MMP9的表達與微血管密度呈正相關。

sentences.english: Objective To review the experience of diagnosis and surgical treatment for giant tumor of mediastinum.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討巨大縱隔腫瘤的診斷和外科治療經驗。

sentences.english: Schwannomas and neurofibromas are benign lesions that are thought to arise from neoplastic transformation of nerve sheath cells.
sentences.chinese: 前兩者是良性腫瘤，一般認爲來自神經鞘細胞的瘤變。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the nephron spring surgery for renal neoplasms.
sentences.chinese: 目的評估保留腎單位手術治療腎腫瘤的效果。

sentences.english: Leiomyosarcoma of the small intestine is an uncommon tumor.
sentences.chinese: 小腸平滑肌肉瘤是一種罕見的腫瘤。

sentences.english: The inhibitory effect on tumor effect of three extracts of D.
sentences.chinese: 本實驗研究迭鞘石斛三種提取物的抗腫瘤作用。

sentences.english: Conclusions Synovial sarcoma of the hypopharynx is a malignant soft-tissue tumor that is seen rarely in the head and neck.
sentences.chinese: 結論喉咽部滑膜肉瘤是頭頸部罕見的軟組織惡性腫瘤。

sentences.english: ADC values and FA values may be predictive of astrocytic tumor classification.
sentences.chinese: FA值在腫瘤良惡性鑑別中有一定的價值。

sentences.english: The death rate of the cancer of breast, lung, bone and leukemias in Xinjiang resident are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 放射性所致居民受照劑量和居民的惡性腫瘤死亡率等。

sentences.english: Both tumors were successfully resected without recurrence.
sentences.chinese: 二者皆經手術成功切除腫瘤且未再復發。

sentences.english: The TP53 tumor suppressor gene is involved in a multiple cellular processes.
sentences.chinese: TP53腫瘤抑制基因參與了多種細胞內過程。

sentences.english: Liver scars also provide an ideal environment for the development of cancers.
sentences.chinese: 肝臟瘢痕還爲肝臟腫瘤的發展提供了理想的環境。

sentences.english: Foci of bizarre nuclei were, however, present in 10 cases.
sentences.chinese: 但是，竈性奇異細胞核出現在10例腫瘤中。

definition: to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
